import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr/public_api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private toastr: ToastrService, ) { } ngOnInit(): void {} }
